text:
Phew... Rain~?
I forgot to bring my umbrella~!

──Here, Kogane. It would be troublesome
if you got wet in the rain and caught a cold.

Sakuya...! Thank you~!
Your umbrella is quite big, isn't it~

Yes, Kogane, scoot over a bit-
I'll join you too―

Hehe, yes.
It's good that the big umbrella seems useful.

What's everyone doing!
Mitsumine, join us!

Hehehe...
Even though it's raining, it feels nice~

──Ah, I want to applaud. To Mamimi,
who gave us this rain and this wonderful time.
